title: Customized Distance Science Education for Adult Learners: Developing Effective Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Basic Knowledge in Science and Work Experience as a Manager
context.additional_context: Targeting adult learners who are corporate managers aged 40+ balancing work commitments. Requires consideration of learning environments at home/work. Supported by digital device infrastructure.

learning_goals: Learners can apply science problem-solving strategies utilizing prior knowledge with over 80% accuracy.
Learners complete given science tasks within a week with a 90% completion rate using pedagogical support tools (templates, checklists, etc.).
Learners engage in communication (discussions, collaboration, etc.) demonstrating social presence at least three times per week through peer feedback activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
